div.head: 水穀下利
div.div: water and grain discharge with free flux

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: water and grain discharge with free flux

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shui gu li 水穀利 , water and grain free-flux [illness]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry chun chu 椿樗：水穀下利及每至立秋前後即患痢，兼腰痛 , “ Water and grain discharge with free - flux as well the free-flux-illness suffers from prior to and after the date ‘spring begins’ are both accompanied by lower back pain”.
